item.description:
Please join us in a workshop on Taoist "natural breathing" from special guest Master Hyunmoon Kim, who is currently visiting from Korea.

In this experiential workshop, we will:

  • Talk about ourselves and any interests in holisitc health
  • Try Taoist yoga postures with lower-abdominal breathwork
  • Learn about the usefulness of meditative breathing
  • Discuss characteristics of a sustainable yoga practice

Yoga combined with meditative breathing will not only develop strength and endurance, but also concentration. Your ability to focus will increase all aspects of your life. It is also great for preventing injuries and aiding muscle repair. And, it helps develop a mind-body connection so you become more aware of what is happening within your own body. Eventually, this awareness allows you to direct the flow of chi, or vital energy.

 

****************

 

Workshop Fee: $25

Participants will receive handouts and information about an upcoming six-class series on breathwork.

This class starts with light stretching, then a 30 minute session with very gentle postures held quietly for up to 1-2 minutes while focusing on the breath. A positive attitude and moderate physical fitness is required.

 

Known for his unique and humorous teaching style,
Master Hyumoon Kim is one of 17 masters
sanctioned by Taoist Hermit Bekyung. He combines
Eastern philosophy with practical knowledge for
modern times. His teachings help students reflect
upon the real meaning of yoga. Master Kim
currently teaches at Hanseo University in Korea.
item.name: Yoga & Natural Breathing
